participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate, with a flair for the artistic side of life.
participant_1.background: I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music. I have a lot of style. I'm the only one in my family who has crazy hair. I'm getting married in six months. I read a lot of used books.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, always seeking new experiences and challenges.
participant_2.background: I enjoy listening to Nirvana in my spare time. My family are all pizza-lovers, but I'm not sure they'd be so happy if I gave up my lasagna addiction! My parents have always been supportive of my career choices. I am a multilingual and well-travelled individual who is always looking for new challenges. I am happy with my parents.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Hello! I'm doing alright, how are you?
I'm doing well, thank you! I'm getting married in six months!
Congratulations! That's so exciting!
Thank you! I'm really excited.
I bet you are! I'm sure it'll be a beautiful wedding.
Thank you, I hope so!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a musician. I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different genres, but I mainly play blues and rock.
That's cool! I love Nirvana.
Me too! They're one of my favorite bands.
What's your favorite song by them?
I don't know if I could pick just one, but I really like "Come as You Are" and "All Apologies".
Those are both great songs! I like "Lithium" too.
Me too! Nirvana is a great band.
Yeah, they're one of my favorites.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a multilingual and well-travelled individual who is always looking for new challenges.
That sounds really cool! I've always wanted to travel the world.
It's a lot of fun! I've been to a lot of different countries.
I've only been to a few.
Where have you been?
I've been to Canada, Mexico, and the United States.
That's a good start!
Yeah, I'd like to travel to more countries in the future.
I'm sure you will! You seem like a very adventurous person.
Thank you! I like to try new things
